definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly

sentences.english: The infinitesimal variations of submanifold with boundary were studied by means of integral formulas.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用积分公式研究了有边界子流形的无穷小变差。

sentences.english: In the 19th century, infinitesimals were replaced by limits.
sentences.chinese: 在19世纪，无穷小，取而代之的限制。

sentences.english: Infinitesimal is involved in a wide range, which has a lot of very good characters.
sentences.chinese: 无穷小涉及的范围广泛，有很多很好的性质。

sentences.english: In this paper, we give general form of equivalent infinitesimal fitting method.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出无穷小拟合法的一般形式。

sentences.english: Negative Infinity is less than everything including itself.
sentences.chinese: 负无穷小于包括其自身在内的任何数。

sentences.english: In this paper we discuss actions of Lie groupoids and their infinitesimal actions on manifolds.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了李群胚在流形上的作用及其无穷小作用。

sentences.english: We find optimal stopping rules by using the weak infinitesimal generator of markov process.
sentences.chinese: 利用弱无穷小算子，我们找出了最优停时规则。

sentences.english: It can be said that mathematical analysis is infinitesimal analysis.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，数学分析就是无穷小分析。

definition: rational number (i.e. fraction of two integers, math.)
field of complex numbers (math.), usually denoted by C
derived function/derivative f' of a function f
